"use client" import { useState, useEffect, useCallback } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import axios from "axios" import Navbar from "../components/Navbar" import Footer from "../components/Footer" import "../App.css" const HomePage = () => { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true) const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState("") const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState("") const [error, setError] = useState(null) // Use useCallback to prevent recreation of this function on each render const fetchProducts = useCallback(async () => { try { setLoading(true) const response = await axios.get("http://localhost:8000/api/products/") setProducts(response.data) setError(null) } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching products:", error) setError("Failed to load products. Please try again later.") } finally { setLoading(false) } }, []) useEffect(() => { // Only fetch once when component mounts fetchProducts() // No dependencies in this array means this effect runs once on mount }, [fetchProducts]) // Memoize filtered products to prevent recalculation on every render const filteredProducts = products.filter((product) => { const matchesSearch = product.name?.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || product.description?.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) const matchesCategory = selectedCategory ? product.category === selectedCategory : true return matchesSearch && matchesCategory }) const categories = ["vegetables", "fruits", "grains", "livestock", "dairy", "other"] return (

Welcome to Smart Farm Connect

Empowering South Sudan's Agricultural Future Through Technology

Connecting farmers, buyers, transporters, and equipment providers in one unified platform

Get Started Learn More

About Smart Farm Connect

Smart Farm Connect is a revolutionary platform designed specifically for South Sudan's agricultural sector. We bridge the gap between farmers, buyers, equipment providers, and transporters, creating a thriving ecosystem that supports food security and economic growth.

Our mission is to modernize agriculture in South Sudan by providing farmers with access to markets, equipment, transportation services, and real-time weather information tailored to local conditions.

500+

Products Listed

24/7

Why Choose Smart Farm Connect?

🌱

For Farmers

Sell your produce directly to buyers, access modern equipment, and get reliable transportation services

  • Direct market access
  • Equipment rental
  • Weather updates
  • Educational resources
🛒

For Buyers

Purchase fresh, quality produce directly from verified farmers across South Sudan

  • Fresh produce
  • Direct from farmers
  • Quality guaranteed
  • Competitive prices
🚚

For Transporters

Connect with farmers and buyers who need reliable transportation services

  • Regular job opportunities
  • Fair pricing
  • Route optimization
  • Secure payments
🚜

For Equipment Providers

Rent out your agricultural equipment to farmers who need modern tools

  • Equipment rental income
  • Asset utilization
  • Maintenance tracking
  • Insurance coverage

Real-Time Weather for South Sudan

Get accurate weather forecasts tailored for agricultural planning
